00002 #ifndef SMALL_OBJ_ALLOCATOR
00003 #define SMALL_OBJ_ALLOCATOR
00004 
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 #include <types.h>
00007 #include "fixed_allocator.hpp"
00008 
00009 #include <cassert>
00010 #include <algorithm>
00011 #include <time.h>
00012 
00013 NS_IZENELIB_AM_BEGIN
00014 
00015 template<
00016   uint8_t  MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE = 64,
00017   uint64_t CHUNK_SIZE = MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE*256
00018   >
00019 class SmallObjAlloc
00020 {
00021   typedef FixedAllocator<CHUNK_SIZE> FixedAllocatorT;
00022   
00023   FixedAllocatorT* fix_alloc_ptrs_[MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE];
00024   
00025 public:
00026   SmallObjAlloc()
00027   {
00028     for (uint8_t i=0; i<MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE; i++)
00029       fix_alloc_ptrs_[i] = NULL;//new FixedAllocatorT(i+1);
00030   }
00031 
00032   void* allocate(std::size_t size)
00033   {
00034     if (size>MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE)
00035       return operator new(size);
00036 
00037     if (fix_alloc_ptrs_[size-1] == NULL)
00038       fix_alloc_ptrs_[size-1] = new FixedAllocatorT(size);
00039 
00040     return fix_alloc_ptrs_[size-1]->allocate();
00041   }
00042 
00043   void deallocate(void* p, std::size_t size)
00044   {
00045     if (size> MAX_SMALL_OBJECT_SIZE)
00046       return operator delete( p);
00047 
00048     assert(fix_alloc_ptrs_[size-1] != NULL);
00049     
00050     return fix_alloc_ptrs_[size-1]->deallocate(p);
00051   }
00052   
00053 private:
00054   
00055   SmallObjAlloc(const SmallObjAlloc&);
00056   SmallObjAlloc& operator=(const SmallObjAlloc&);
00057 
00058 }
00059   ;
00060   
00061 NS_IZENELIB_AM_END
00062 #endif // SMALLOBJ_INC_
